translation.en: ♪ Watch me backflip ♪
♪ Let me work my magic ♪
translation.es: BASADA EN UN LIBRO DE DR. SEUSS

translation.en: Just east of North Westville and south of Goo- bai,
translation.es: Al este de Westville del Norte y al sur de Gubái,

translation.en: a town known as Glurfsburg might catch your eye.
translation.es: un pueblo conocido como Glurfsburg podría llamarte la atención.

translation.en: Our story starts here.
Who knows what's in store?
It begins with a kite, and then...
translation.es: Comienza con una cometa y luego...

translation.en: - Shut the front door! - Whoa!
That is a... That's a ninja!
This is Dr. Seuss, so I wasn't expecting--
translation.es: Esto es Seuss, no espero que...

translation.en: Oh, why would you cut the line?
What's a piece of paper gonna do?
Oh, you just answered my question.
Dive roll!
This sneak has snuck into a zoo!
Past the Moostrich,
the Walvark,
and the Llama- Gnu.
That wall is no problem. It's barely a hurdle!
translation.es: Ese muro no es un problema, apenas es un obstáculo.

translation.en: But the same can't be said of those large slapping turtles!
translation.es: ¡Pero no se puede decir lo mismo de esas tortugas!

translation.en: - Oh! With the right flipper! -
Okay, okay. Shh, shh, shh, shh. Easy. Easy, now.
Easy!
Easy, big fella.
Oh, wow!
Yet, when the guard got there, see what he learnt:
translation.es: Cuando el guardia llegó, aprendió una cosa.

translation.en: The cage was still present, but man and beast...
translation.es: La jaula aún seguía ahí, pero el hombre y la bestia

translation.en: weren't.
On your left! Busy inventor coming through!
Well, I'm gonna be late! I'm going to be late!
Who's this guy, you wonder, rushing round in a hurry?
translation.es: ¿Quién es este corriendo así?, te preguntas.

translation.en: Relax with the questions.
translation.es: No hagas tantas preguntas, ya lo sabrás. No te preocupes.

translation.en: We'll get there. Don't worry.
translation.es: No hagas tantas preguntas, ya lo sabrás. No te preocupes. REUNIÓN IMPORTANTE

translation.en: - - Right on time.
This is it.
Who puts a puddle--
- Oh! - Hey, mister! Save the Yips?
No time.
They have the Yaps, but we're searching for a cure!
translation.es: Tienen Yaps, pero estamos buscando una cura.

translation.en: Please, sign here.
Stupid Yips and Yaps making me late!
Oh.
E- Excuse me, sir. Would you mind taking a photo of us?
- No! - Great! Thanks.
That's not what I meant.
It's the button on top.
Say, I'm ruining your life!
We're ruining your life!
- - Oh, come on!
I'm Guy, life- long inventor, here for the biggest meeting of my life!
translation.es: Soy Guy. Inventor. Tengo la reunión más importante de mi vida.

translation.en: That's nice.
Have a seat. We'll be with you in the next seven hours.
translation.es: Siéntese. Lo llamaré en las próximas siete horas.

translation.en: Look at the neat and amazing inventions!
Every one worthy of Snerz's attention!
translation.es: Todos dignos de la atención de Snerz.

translation.en: - There's an anti- umbrella! -
And a tree stump de- rooter!
And right over there is a narrator muter!
translation.es: ¡Y ahí hay un silenciador de narrador!

translation.en: I wonder what that does?
Wait! Hold on! No! Stop turning the dial, please! I can't--
translation.es: Espera. ¡No! Deja de girar la perilla.

translation.en: - - Yours is a winner for sure!
All right! Woo- hoo! I'm going to Meepville!
Oh, I hope we make the cut!
Fingers crossed!
Ooh! An auto finger- crosser? They said it couldn't be done!
translation.es: ¿Un cruzador de dedos automático? Creí que era imposible.

translation.en: - - So, what's your invention?
It's, uh... It's nothing special.
Ooh! Nothing special? Sounds special!
Ooh, nice!
Get a load of that! Snerz is gonna love that!
translation.es: ¡Mira esto! ¡A Snerz le va a encantar!

translation.en: A narrator muter? These people have no idea what I do. This is my craft--
translation.es: ¿Un silenciador de narrador? No entienden mi arte...

translation.en: - Support the Yips, sir? - Ah- ha! I'm back!
My volume's off zero!
- Just in time to meet our other hero! -
translation.es: Justo a tiempo para conocer a nuestro otro héroe.

translation.en: Whoa! Nice, try there, puddle. Not gonna catch me!
translation.es: ¡Vaya! Buen intento, charco. No me atraparás.

translation.en: Ah, why not?
- Mister, support the Yips? - Yips?
- Oh! - I heard they have the Yaps.
Just tragic. Okay, where do I sign? Can I do it more than once?
translation.es: Es trágico. ¿Dónde firmo? ¿Puedo hacerlo más de una vez?

translation.en: Boing! Handspring!
Whoo!
Here we go! Uh- oh! Coming through!
Oh, family photo! Priceless moment! Say cheese!
translation.es: ¡Foto de familia! Momento invaluable. Digan whisky.

translation.en: - Give me duck face! Tea pot arms! -
translation.es: Cara de pato. Brazos de taza. Pierna arriba.

translation.en: Put a leg in the air! Pucker hard! Squat!
translation.es: Cara de pato. Brazos de taza. Pierna arriba. Beso. Cuclillas. ¡Grito!

translation.en: - Scream! -
Thanks, Mister!
Hey, what's your name?
I'm Sam.
Sam- I- Am.
Guy- Am- I?
Is there a Guy- Am- I here?
I'm the only person in this room.
You sure there isn't anyone else you want to squeeze in first?
translation.es: ¿Segura que no hay nadie más que quieras meter primero?

translation.en: Nope. You're the absolute, very last person they wanted to see.
translation.es: No, es la última persona que querían ver.

translation.en: Lose the frown, kid.
They're just a bunch of bean counters and pencil pushers.
translation.es: Son solo contadores de frijoles y administrativos.

translation.en: One bean.
Two beans.
Our friend Guy- Am- I hasn't been a success.
translation.es: Nuestro amigo Guy Soy Yo no ha tenido éxito.

translation.en: Every invention's ended up a huge mess.
translation.es: Cada invento terminó siendo un desastre.

translation.en: All that failure has made his hope nearly run dry.
translation.es: DIRECTIVO El fracaso hizo que casi se le acabe la esperanza.

translation.en: But today, he's gonna give it...
One last try.
7,462 beans.
translation.es: Siete mil cuatrocientos sesenta y dos frijoles.

translation.en: 7,463 beans.
translation.es: Siete mil cuatrocientos sesenta y tres.

translation.en: All right, buddy. You're up.
Dazzle us.
Isn't travel the worst?
Trapped on a cold air balloon with a bunch of strangers, all of 'em yacking at you,
translation.es: Atrapados en un globo de aire frío con extrañosque te hablan,

translation.en: pestering you, never letting you stew in peace.
translation.es: te molestan y no te dejan en paz.

translation.en: Stuck at the mercy of someone else's schedule as the last bus pulls away,
translation.es: A la merced de los horarios de otro cuando el último autobús se va,

translation.en: - and you're not on it! - 7,469 beans.
translation.es: - y no llegaste. - Siete mil cuatrocientos sesenta y nueve.

translation.en: Well, what if you could go where you want to,
translation.es: - y no llegaste. - Siete mil cuatrocientos sesenta y nueve. ¿Y si pudieras ir adónde quieras,

translation.en: whenever you want to, entirely on your own?
Now you can.
With the Self- Flyer.
- Hmm, interesting. - Ooh. - I'm leaning in. - Intriguing.
I was ignoring the sad man, but he has my attention now!
translation.es: Ignoraba al hombre triste, pero captó mi atención.

translation.en: Exclusive, aspirational, definitely Snerz- worthy!
translation.es: ¡Exclusivo, inspirador, sin duda digno de Snerz!

translation.en: Oh!  That's good.
Just what every child needs! A death trap strapped onto their back!
translation.es: Lo que todo niño necesita, una trampa mortal.

translation.en: This thing is 100% safe,
as you will see in the following demonstration,
translation.es: como verán en la siguiente demostración.

translation.en: when I 100% won't explode.
translation.es: como verán en la siguiente demostración. No explotará.

translation.en: Ooh, I like it.
Don't explode. Don't explode. Don't explode.
Wowzers!
I'm not exploding!
Self- Flyer.
I think we're all in agreement.
You're going to Meepville! Get ready to pitch to Snerz himself!
translation.es: ¡Vas a Meepville! ¡Prepárate para presentárselo a Snerz!

translation.en: See you...
SnerzDay!
Guy felt fantastic! He'd finally won!
He'd invented a thing- a- ma- do that had done!
translation.es: ¡Había inventado una cosa que había hecho!

translation.en: No, not my beans!
Holy moly!
Oh, dear. I'm not gonna say, I told you so, because I've written it down.
translation.es: Cielos. No diré que te lo dije porque lo escribí.

translation.en: Guy wondered why he bothered to even show up...
translation.es: Guy se preguntaba por qué se presentaba

translation.en: when everything he invented was sure to blow up.
translation.es: cuando todo lo que inventaba explotaba.

translation.en: There's Guy's critic, bean counter Michellee,
whose face always looked like she'd smelled something... smelly.
translation.es: quien siempre parecía haber olido algo oloroso.

translation.en: Oh, just the thought of that awful device gives me the fuzzles.
translation.es: La sola idea de ese horrible aparato me eriza.

translation.en: I wouldn't let my daughter go anywhere near it.
translation.es: No dejaría que mi hija se acercara.

translation.en: E.B. is very fragile.
E.B.'s not so fragile. If her mom only knew
translation.es: EB no era frágil. Si su mamá supiera

translation.en: that she's luring a Pandog with cheese- stuffed bamboo.
translation.es: que atrae a un can-da con una caña llena de queso.

translation.en: Mom would have a conniption. No pets is the rule!
translation.es: Mamá tendría un berrinche. No se permiten mascotas.

translation.en: But E.B.'s not listening, 'cause...
translation.es: Pero EB no hacía caso, porque...

translation.en: A pet would be cool!
Come on!
Come on!
Don't worry.
I won't tell your mother.
translation.es: no le diré a tu madre.

translation.en: Thank you, Mrs. McGrisses.
As long as you buy me a car!
- What? - I like them red and fast!
Flames on the side.
You know I'm ten, right?
Hey, E.B.! Wanna ride occycles?
Do I want to? Yes.
Can I? No.
Because I don't have one. Because my mom won't let me.
translation.es: No tengo uno porque mi mamá no me deja.

translation.en: Hey, why don't you hop on my handlebars then?
My mom would be able to tell.
She checks my eyebrows for wind- blownness
translation.es: Me revisa por marcas de viento

translation.en: and my general disposition for any traces of exhilaration or whimsy.
translation.es: y mi disposición general a cualquier rastro de euforia.

translation.en: Ouch.
Yeah, you should just get out of here.
Just this conversation is slightly whimsilarating.
translation.es: Esta conversación ya es un poco emocionante.

translation.en: We interrupt this old person soap opera to report:
a Chickeraffe has escaped the Glurfsburg Zoo!
translation.es: que un jiralllina escapó del zoológico de Glurfsburg.

translation.en: Hey!
This animal is wild and should be considered extremely dangerous!
translation.es: Este animal es salvaje y debe considerarse extremadamente peligroso.

translation.en: Looks like I just found my new pet.
translation.es: Parece que encontré a mi nueva mascota.

translation.en: Greetings, we have some questions about the Chickeraffe.
translation.es: Saludos, tenemos preguntas sobre el jirallina.

translation.en: I already told you cops everything I know.
translation.es: Ya les dije todo lo que sé.

translation.en: Eh- eh. We're not the cops.
We're the BADGUYS.
Yeah, it's even on our card. Check it out!
Sweet font, huh? You have cards?
No, no, no!
D- Don't hurt me! I- I- I'll tell you anything!
- - Where is the Chickeraffe?
Better talk fast, 'cause this pole's getting really heavy!
translation.es: Mejor habla rápido porque esto es muy pesado.

translation.en: I- It just escaped! It ran away!
He's a liar!
Please, McWinkle. Can I drop him, please?
If the man were a liar, his pants would be on fire.
translation.es: Si fuera un mentiroso, sus pantalones se prenderían fuego.

translation.en: Those are clearly just scaredy pants.
Tell me, coward, did you find anything unusual at the scene?
translation.es: Dime, cobarde, ¿encontraste algo inusual en la escena?

translation.en: Unusual? No.
Just a kite, a snorkel, and a pole vault pole.
translation.es: Solo una cometa, un snorkel y una garrocha.

translation.en: Gluntz, let him go.
I meant let him go... free.
Oops! My bad. My bad.
Sorry 'bout that.
How many jobs have I done, Gluntz?
862! A BADGUY record!
And how many jobs have you done?
Roof slide! One, sir! Uh, counting this one.
And may I just say, it has been sick!
This was no escape. Someone broke in and took that Chickeraffe.
translation.es: No fue una fuga. Alguien se robó al jirallina.

translation.en: That someone has the animal. He is our target.
translation.es: Alguien tiene al animal. Él es nuestro objetivo.

translation.en: Can you see me? I am jacked right now!
I have always wanted a target!
We find the target, we find the Chickeraffe
translation.es: Si encontramos al objetivo, encontramos al jirallina

translation.en: and deliver it directly to the Bigman.
translation.es: Si encontramos al objetivo, encontramos al jirallina y lo entregamos al jefe.

translation.en: In Meepville, there was no man bigger than Snerz,
translation.es: En Meepville, Snerz era el más importante.

translation.en: whose hair was, in fact, just a miniature Flerz.
translation.es: Su cabello no era más que un mini Flerz.

translation.en: Tell me, Yes Man, is it ready?
Y- Yes, Mr. Snerz.
He owned everything that a Snerson could own!
translation.es: ¡Tenía todo lo que una snerzona podía tener!

translation.en: Like a solid gold stapler and a gold- plated stone.
translation.es: Como una grapadora de oro y una piedra dorada.

translation.en: Careful with my stone! It's covered in gold!
translation.es: ¡Cuidado con mi piedra! ¡Está cubierta de oro!

translation.en: Yes, Mr. Snerz.
But his pets were his most belovedest treasures.
translation.es: Pero sus mascotas eran su tesoro más preciado.

translation.en: Animal friends who'd be with him...
translation.es: Amigos animales que estarían con él

translation.en: - - ...forever.
Greetings, little ones!
- - Stay!
That's very good.
Daddy loves you, too.
Just one spot remained on Snerz's wall,
translation.es: Solo quedaba un lugar en la pared de Snerz,

translation.en: and it was reserved for the rarest of all.
translation.es: y estaba reservado para el más raro de todos.

translation.en: Guy has inventions but no place called home.
translation.es: Guy tenía inventos, pero no un hogar.

translation.en: And right now, he's desperate to take off and roam.
translation.es: Y ahora está desesperado por irse y vagar.

translation.en: Where does it matter, be it far or near?
translation.es: No importa dónde, si lejos o cerca,

translation.en: As long as it's AnyOldWhereButHere.
translation.es: siempre y cuando sea en cualquier otra parte.

translation.en: The 4:28 bus to AnyOldWhereButHere is departing in three seconds.
translation.es: El autobús a Cualquier otra parte sale en tres segundos.

translation.en: - Three seconds until-- - No!
That's it. That was three seconds.
No! Stop the bus, please!
Stop the bus!
Stupid invention!
Stupid Guy!
I give up!
Stupid bus! Stupid town! Stupid sidewalk!
Stupid hat.
Welcome to our diner, diner!
Okay...
- Apps are over here. - I'll have the oatmush.
translation.es: - Los aperitivos están aquí. - Quiero avena.

translation.en: Swirl of jam with that?
- No. - How about a touch of honey, honey?
Just oatmush, dry, and a spoon.
translation.es: Solo papilla de avena seca, y una cuchara.

translation.en: One Sad Man's Special!
One Sad Man's Special comin' up!
What to do next? Certainly not invent.
But Guy needed something to help pay the rent.
translation.es: Guy necesitaba algo para pagar la renta.

translation.en: Afternoon, Donna.
Love what you've done with your fur!
Oh, you! Same as it always is.
translation.es: Ay, tú. Está igual que siempre.

translation.en: Oh, wow. Look at this!
We're Briefcase Buddies!
It's like finding a matching snowflake.
translation.es: Es como encontrar dos copos de nieve iguales.

translation.en: It's an unremarkable attache sold in most major stores.
translation.es: Es un agregado sin importancia vendido en todas las tiendas.

translation.en: And we both bought it!
Plus, to end up sitting next to each other like this.
translation.es: Y nos sentamos el uno al lado del otro.

translation.en: I mean... wow.
I'm just gonna say wow!
I am Sam.
Sam- I- Am. Of the Glurfsburg I- Am's.
translation.es: Sam Yo Soy, de los Yo Soy de Glurfburg.

translation.en: Perhaps you've heard of us? What's your handle, partner?
translation.es: ¿Has oído de nosotros? ¿Tú cómo te llamas?

translation.en: Grrrumph! Lovely name. How do you spell that?
translation.es: Grumf. Qué lindo nombre. ¿Cómo se escribe?

translation.en: Is that one rumph or two?
So, Sam, I imagine you'll be having the ushe?
translation.es: Sam, imagino que comerás lo de siempre.

translation.en: If you insist.
- Green eggs and ham! - Comin' up!
translation.es: - Huevos verdes con jamón. - Una orden.

translation.en: You don't like green eggs and ham?
translation.es: ¿No te gustan los huevos verdes con jamón?

translation.en: No, I do not like them, Sam- I- Am.
I do not like green eggs and ham.
translation.es: No me gustan los huevos verdes con jamón.

translation.en: Understood. Question asked and answered.
No further queries necessary.
Have you ever tried them before?
Well, how can you be so sure you don't like 'em if you've never actually eaten 'em?
translation.es: ¿Cómo sabes que no te gustan si nunca los probaste?

translation.en: Well, I've never eaten Walvark droppings, but I'm certain I wouldn't enjoy those either.
translation.es: Nunca comí excremento, pero sé que tampoco me gustará.

translation.en: But green eggs and ham are the most deliciousist, nutritiousist,
translation.es: Pero los huevos verdes con jamón

translation.en: greenisist thing in the world!
translation.es: es lo más delicioso del mundo.

translation.en: And PS, they're especially good here.
That's fantastic. But I don't want them, here or otherwise.
translation.es: Suena fantástico, pero no quiero. Ni aquí ni nunca.

translation.en: Tell you what, make that two orders, Donna. On me.
translation.es: Donna, que sean dos órdenes. Yo pago.

translation.en: No! Just oatmush! And a spoon!
Sad Man's Special. Tsk!
Suit yourself.
So, what'd you fail at?
Would you please just leave me alone? - - Order up!
Oh, boy! Oh, boy! Oh, boy! It's coming!
Bring them in for a landing! The hangar is open!
- Here's the ushe, hun. Enjoy. - Oh, yes!
Excuse me, but I ordered mine first.
Food comes out when it's ready.
translation.es: La comida sale cuando está lista.

translation.en: Oh, that's a good nose. It's an eggy nose.
translation.es: Es un buen olor a huevos.

translation.en: I'm getting hints of egg, and yes, definitely green.
Mmm! This is so good! It's like eating little pieces of joy.
translation.es: ¡Es muy rico! Es como comer pedacitos de alegría.

translation.en: Each bite!
Joy!
Mmm! More joy!
What do you recommend for a celebration? Because...
We're going to Meepville!
- Drop the flavor hammer, Bert! - You got it!
- Egg- cellent! - Fantastic!
So green!
Can't wait to try them in Meepville!
♪ Funny, but it's true ♪
translation.es: TODOS LOS INVENTORES SELECCIONADOS MENOS UNO

translation.en: Hey, Donna, sorry to be a nudge,
but my Briefcase Buddy here is still waiting on an oatmush.
translation.es: pero mi amigo sigue esperando su avena.

translation.en: - Spoon on the side? - You got it, sport.
Thanks. You're a peach.
Thank you.
No problem. That's what best friends are for!
translation.es: No hay problema. ¡Para eso están los amigos!

translation.en: - I just met you. -  Order up!
- Sad Man's Special. - Finally.
translation.es: - Un Especial para afligidos. - Por fin.

translation.en: Bon appétit.
Careful! That bowl's hot!
I'm fine. Okay?
Great meeting you, Grumph!
My name is Guy.
Huh, that's a weird name.
Chickeraffe- catching apparatus complete.
translation.es: Aparato de captura de jirallina completo.

translation.en: Now, to test it on our first live subject,
the rare northeastern babysitter.
E.B., I'm home.
- E.B.? - Your daughter owes me a car.
translation.es: - ¿EB? - Tu hija me debe un auto.

translation.en: It's gonna be red.
Okay.
Well, thank you, Mrs. McGrisses. Yeah.
Oh, uh...  Good evening, Mother!
Oh! There's the bean that counts most of all.
translation.es: El frijol más importante de todos.

translation.en: I detect a hint of... - whimsy? -
I'll allow it.
So, who's excited about our big business trip?
translation.es: ¿Estás emocionada por nuestro viaje de negocios?

translation.en: Me. I am. Definitely.
But... counter- proposal, maybe I could just stay here.
translation.es: Pero, contrapropuesta, tal vez podría quedarme aquí.

translation.en: But I thought you were looking forward to seeing Meepville.
You know, I'm just worried about the big city,
where every step is a roll of the dice.
translation.es: Donde cada paso es una tirada de dados.

translation.en: Maybe I'd be safer here in boring Glurfsburg where nothing ever happens.
translation.es: Estaré más segura en Glurfsburg donde nada sucede.

translation.en: Something happens in Glurfsburg!
If there are children or over- protective single mothers in the room,
translation.es: Si eres un niño o una madre sobreprotectora,

translation.en: - you may want to ask them to leave. - Oh, my!
Do not panic! Chickeraffes are incredibly scary!
They have huge teeth, sharp claws, a beak that can snap a man in two...
translation.es: Tienen dientes enormes, garras afiladas, un pico que puede partirte en dos.

translation.en: I've-- I've seen this one before.
Spoiler alert: It's all made up and not worth paying attention to.
translation.es: Está inventando todo, no prestes atención.

translation.en: Stare at one too long, and it'll steal your soul!
translation.es: Si los miras demasiado te roban el alma.

translation.en: Ah! What was that?
Was that a Chickeraffe? Run for your lives!
It can smell my fear!
Oh! Oh, my! Right here in Glurfsburg?
Cheese- stuffed bamboo?
E.B., this creature is not a pet. It's terror on four feet!
translation.es: EB, no es una mascota. ¡Es terror en cuatro patas!

translation.en: Chickeraffes walk on two feet, Mom.
Of course.
So they can use the other two to mash their prey into a fine paste.
translation.es: Usan las otras dos para aplastar a sus presas.

translation.en: You are definitely coming with me to Meepville, young lady.
And yes, the big city can be dangerous.
translation.es: Y sí, la gran ciudad puede ser peligrosa.

translation.en: Which is why we have these!
They're Friendship Bracelets!
Genuine Friendship!
- Fun! Right? -
This way, we can stick together and be safe always, like friends.
translation.es: Así nos mantendremos unidas y a salvo como amigas.

translation.en: The time hadcome to choose a choice.
translation.es: Había llegado el momento de elegir.

translation.en: I do love inventing.
Said his hopefulest voice.
But stuff blowing up is a valid complaint.
translation.es: Pero las explosiones son una queja válida.

translation.en: Could it be time to start watching paint?
Hey, drive safe, Philip!
You may say those leftovers are for the Pandog, but we all know they're for you.
translation.es: Las sobras no son para el can-da, todos sabemos que son para ti.

translation.en: Am I right?
Oh, classic Philip.
Mmkay, it's closing time, Sam.
Oh, right.
Right. Thanks, Donna.
It's getting late. I should probably be heading home anyway.
translation.es: Se hace tarde. Ya debería irme.

translation.en: Got a bunch of friends there waiting for me.
translation.es: Tengo un montón de amigos esperándome.

translation.en: Gonna be a real hoot.
Possibly a double hoot.
I should give you my address in case you and the kitchen staff feel like coming by.
translation.es: Te daré mi dirección por si quieren visitarme.

translation.en: I still have it, Sam.
From the last time you invited us?
translation.es: De la última vez que nos invitaste.

translation.en: And the six times before that.
Oh, yeah. Of course.
Of course!
Night, Donna!
Goodnight, Sam.
- - This is Officer 17
translation.es: Les recuerdo a todas las unidades

translation.en: reminding all unitsthat the Chickeraffe
translation.es: Les recuerdo a todas las unidades que el jirallina es extremadamente peligroso.

translation.en: - is extremely dangerous! - Oh!
translation.es: que el jirallina es extremadamente peligroso.

translation.en: - Please proceed with caution! -
- - Did you see that?  Uh, yeah, I think it went down that alley.
translation.es: - ¿Viste eso? - Sí, se fue por ese callejón.

translation.en: Was that it? Check it out!
Uh, you go first!
You're coming with me, Chickeraffe.
We're going to Meepville!
♪ Ba, ba, ba, ba, Meepville! ♪ ♪ Ba, ba, ba, ba, Meepville! ♪
♪ Ba, ba, ba, ba, Meepville! ♪
♪ Ba, ba, ba, ba, Meepville! ♪
You can still hear us!
Those are just curtains!
♪ Ba, ba, ba, ba, Meepville... ♪
translation.es: ¡La la la la Meepville! ¡La la la la Meepville!

translation.en: Guy picked the briefcase! He'll fix his Self- Flyer!
translation.es: Guy tomó su maletín. ¡Reparará el unicóptero!

translation.en: My bad. He's tossing it into that fire.
translation.es: Me equivoqué. Lo arrojará al fuego.

translation.en: No, no, no!
